Brooklyn Nets head coach Steve Nash says the team made a "difficult" decision to shelve star point guard Kyrie Irving until he gets vaccinated against COVID-19.

articles.author: AAP
articles.title: Australian Open men's and women's golf events cancelled - ESPN Australia
articles.description: The 2021 Australian Open and the 2022 Women's Australian Open have been cancelled as the COVID-19 pandemic continues to play havoc with international travel plans.
articles.content:
The 2021 Australian Open and the 2022 Women's Australian Open have been cancelled as the COVID-19 pandemic continues to play havoc with international travel plans.
